net.wombatrpgs.mgnse.tree
Class SchemaTree

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JTree
                  net.wombatrpgs.mgnse.tree.SchemaTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.Scrollable
public class SchemaTree
extends javax.swing.JTree

A panel for reprsenting schema and database entries. Extends JTree so you can just embed it wherever provided you give it the right shit.

See Also:
Serialized Form

All known schema types

getSchemaDisplayPath

public static java.lang.String getSchemaDisplayPath(java.lang.Class<? extends MainSchema> schemaClass)
Gets the locally displayed user-facing path of a schema from its annotations

Parameters:
schemaClass - The schema class
Returns:
The path to where the schema should be displayed

refreshSchema

public void refreshSchema()
Updates the contents of the tree to reflect the file system.

refreshData

public void refreshData()
Loads in all the database entries from the database!

clear

public void clear()
Clears the data model for empty projects.

getSelectedNode

public SchemaNode getSelectedNode()
Returns the selected data node. This will return null if nothing or schema is selected.

Returns:
The last selected data, null if none

getSelectedClass

public java.lang.Class<? extends MainSchema> getSelectedClass()
Returns the selected class. The selection could be either an individual schema or a lot of schema but this returns their class either way. Could return null if a bigger folder is selected.

Returns:

addDataEntry

public SchemaNode addDataEntry(java.io.File data)
Adds a single data object. Does not auto-validate.

Parameters:
data - The data file to add from
Returns:
The node that was created

deleteDataEntry

public void deleteDataEntry(SchemaNode node)
Deletes a schema node from the tree. Auto-revalidates.

Parameters:
node - The node to delete

selectNode

public void selectNode(javax.swing.tree.TreeNode node)
Selects the node in the tree. Assumes the node already exists in the tree.

Parameters:
node - The node to select

refresh

public void refresh()
Call whenever nodes added/deleted.

fileUrlToBinaryName

private static java.lang.String fileUrlToBinaryName(java.lang.String fileURL)
Converts a file URL to java class name.

Parameters:
fileURL - The URL to the file
Returns:
The qualified class name of the file

getNodeByPath

private SchemaNode getNodeByPath(SchemaNode base,
                                 java.lang.String path,
                                 java.lang.Class<? extends MainSchema> creationClass)
Gets a schema node from the internal tree.

Parameters:
base - Base node to look from
path - The path to the required element (display, not file/class)
creationClass - The class to use to create new nodes, null if no new nodes should be created

getSchemaByFile

private java.lang.Class<? extends MainSchema> getSchemaByFile(java.io.File dataFile)
Gets the actual schema for a data object based on its file location.

Parameters:
dataFile - The data file to get the schema for
Returns:
The class of schema of the data

getMainSchemaDirectory

private java.io.File getMainSchemaDirectory(java.io.File dataFile)
Gets the directory corresponding to this file's schema. For instance, if this data file was a monster (even Path("/monster/bosses")), this would return net/wombatrpgs/schema/monster directory.

Parameters:
dataFile - The file to get the schema directory of
Returns:
The root schema directory for the data file

getDataSubdir

private java.lang.String getDataSubdir(java.io.File dataFile)
Get the subdirectory this data entry is located at within its parent schema directory.

Parameters:
dataFile - The file with the data to read
Returns:
The path this file should be in local to the schema

loadData

private void loadData(java.io.File dir)
Loads all database entries from the directory. Recursive.

Parameters:
dir - The directory to start loading from
